statement: Define canonical GA4+Ads+Velo/Wix observed-data terminology and caveat language so non-technical marketers can distinguish observed performance from inference and context.
Enumerate adversarial risks in GA4/Ads/Velo/Wix aggregation narratives where attribution confidence is overstated or source-class boundaries are laundered; define triggerable fail states.
Map marketer/operator journey contracts for moving from simulated analytics interpretation to observed cross-channel decision workflows without continuity breaks.
Define non-negotiable decision-contract constraints for Tier-1 observed aggregation (GA4+Ads+Velo/Wix), including freshness, provenance, and confidence downgrade/block thresholds.
Produce a confidence-and-caveat communication strategy pack for non-technical marketers covering pre-launch, in-flight, and post-campaign analytics readouts.
Synthesize CR-BLUE-0079 through CR-BLUE-0083 into one phased GA dataflow strategic integration directive with unresolved tradeoffs preserved for QA sequencing.
Define source-priority governance narrative for leadership that locks sequencing as Tier-1 observed aggregation first, social second, and scraped/simulated as bounded support lanes.
Add validator enforcing source-class labels (`observed`,`scraped_first_party`,`simulated`,`connector_derived`) on every KPI narrative section.
Add phrase-class validator that blocks causal verbs unless causal-guard fields (method + uncertainty + counterfactual note) are present.
Define threshold semantics mapping partial-ingestion states to `action_review_only` versus `action_blocked` outcomes.
Publish abuse tests for denominator-policy drift and attribution-window switching that can inflate KPI narratives.
Publish operator-facing report-annotation copy templates for missing data, delayed conversions, and partial ingestion states.
Synthesize KPI semantics, confidence-label rules, and annotation contract into one QA sequencing brief for the GA dataflow cycle.
Implement foundational typed GA4/Google Ads/Velo/Wix data contracts with provenance/freshness/source-class fields.
Implement connector fail-closed validators and advisory-only routing for replay/authenticity/freshness/schema failures.
Implement attribution-window and confidence downgrade controls tied to evidence sufficiency and identity quality.
Implement decision-grade reporting surfaces with explicit observed/scraped/simulated separation and provenance lineage.
Implement fail-safe rollback path for ingestion/attribution degradation with last-known-good reporting continuity.
Implement source-class freshness SLA validator with block/warn routing by class for ingestion eligibility.
Implement schema-drift fail-closed validator with quarantine state for connector contract mismatches.
Implement high-impact identity-resolution confidence gate validator (confidence floor + duplicate-rate cap).
Implement source-class separation validator across normalization and reporting outputs with caveat mapping checks.
Implement attribution integrity validator enforcing window delta thresholds, assumption presence, and confidence-bound causal language.
Implement GA reporting publish-gate validator for provenance, freshness, caveat completeness, and prohibited implication scan.
Implement cost/runtime guardrail checks for scheduled refresh/report generation with 80% warn and 100% block semantics.
Implement connector retry-budget validator (max 2 retries) with review_only fallback and non-bypass enforcement.
Define canonical marketer-facing language pack for `what_changed_why` sections, including required reason taxonomy and prohibited causal-overstatement phrases.
Define hard gate semantics mapping fallback states (`action_blocked|action_limited|action_review_only`) to allowed action scope and publish restrictions for Tier-1 observed reports.
Synthesize Blue GA dataflow wave and Green workflow contract into phased rollout guidance (pilot -> stabilize -> scale) with unresolved tradeoffs preserved for QA sequencing.
Implement review-artifact validation for mandatory `what_changed_why` section fields and reason taxonomy presence for Tier-1 report artifacts.
Implement fallback-state communication validator ensuring `action_blocked|limited|review_only` narratives include required caveats and prohibit external-approval language in constrained states.
Publish human-readable attribution uncertainty and freshness-lag explanation templates bound to action guidance for pre-launch, in-flight, and post-campaign reports.
Map marketer/operator journey contracts for moving from simulated analytics interpretation to observed cross-channel decision workflows without continuity breaks.
